name: Naruto: The Broken Bond
summary: Building on the success of NARUTO: Rise of a Ninja, this new adventure takes the story to a deeper level within the Naruto Universe. Now a respected ninja, Naruto evolves into a mature and strong hero. However he will soon find himself surrounded by conflict. Forced to relive bitter memories, Naruto's best friend Sasuke strikes out on a self-destructive quest for power. Now with the help of his friends, Naruto must confront Sasuke and save him before it's too late.

esrb.synopsis: Naruto: The Broken Bond is an action fighting game based on the animated Naruto TV show. Players mostly battle characters in three dimensional, one-on-one combat using martial arts combos, special attacks called 'jutsu,' and – occasionally – thrown weapons (kunai, staff, bombs). Cutscenes also depict characters engaged in fight sequences. During one cutscene, a boy gets stabbed in the back with several thrown daggers. One of the special jutsu moves is called the 'Sexy Jutsu,' which when invoked, displays a naked girl covered in clouds. Another character is referred to as 'pervy sage' and is briefly shown chasing women into a restaurant.
